minor.issue: Health endpoint not implemented (returns 404) - not critical

issues: Hero image shows Netflix-style 'N' logo - may want to replace with custom branding

Stripe checkout integration working correctly with emergent integrations
MuxPlayer component properly imported and conditionally rendered based on intro_video_mux_id setting
